metadata.name: Pirate Adventure
metadata.description: You're a pirate sailing the high seas in search of treasure, adventure, and glory. Navigate dangerous waters, manage your crew, and outsmart rival pirates and naval forces.

startingPoint: You've just been appointed captain of your own ship, the 'Fortune's Wind'. Your former captain has retired and left you with a mysterious map that supposedly leads to a legendary treasure. The crew is eager for adventure, but skeptical of your leadership. A storm is brewing on the horizon, and rumors of the Royal Navy patrolling these waters have the crew on edge.

sailing.name: Sailing
sailing.description: Navigate treacherous waters and outmaneuver enemies

crew_management.name: Crew Management
crew_management.description: Keep your crew motivated and prevent mutiny

sword_fighting.name: Sword Fighting
sword_fighting.description: Engage in close combat with enemies

negotiation.name: Negotiation
negotiation.description: Bargain with merchants, officials, and other pirates

intimidation.name: Intimidation
intimidation.description: Strike fear into enemies and assert dominance

background.name: Background
background.description: What was your life before becoming a pirate?

motivation.name: Motivation
motivation.description: What drives you to live the pirate life?

crew.name: First Mate Jenkins
crew.description: Loyal but constantly questioning your decisions. Has been sailing these waters for decades.

crew.name: Quartermaster Rodriguez
crew.description: Manages ship supplies and crew payments. Highly respected by the crew.

crew.name: Ship's Cook 'One-eyed' Pete
crew.description: Knows all the gossip and rumors. Potentially has a hidden agenda.

rivals.name: Captain Blackbane
rivals.description: Notorious pirate captain with a fearsome reputation. Has a personal vendetta against you.

rivals.name: Commodore Wellington
rivals.description: Royal Navy officer tasked with eliminating piracy in these waters.
